title: Activity-Based Entrepreneurial Mathematics Education: Social Problem-Solving Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Course for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, focusing on developing entrepreneurial ideas and solving social problems using mathematical thinking. Conducted through online-offline hybrid classes using digital devices (laptops/tablets)

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world social problems using mathematical modeling and propose solutions.
Learners can validate startup ideas numerically and write feasibility reports.
Learners can calculate budget/revenue models in a business plan using mathematical tools through team-based projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
